item.title: Interactive Premier League Table
item.description: For my inaugural blog post I decided I would step into the world of animated graphics for the first time. I was inspired by the presentation that Thomas Lin Pedersen gave at the useR! conference on gganimate and was motivated to create my very first gif. I rooted around for ideas and decided upon creating an animated table of the Premier League for the last season, with the clubs being depicted by their crests.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a data scientist for the UK Government. I enjoy football, reading, video games, and anything R related. I began this blog in 2018 to share some of the awesome things I have picked up over the years using R. Thanks for reading!
